DATA.description: Allows to read KPI values and their history.

DATA.name: Metrics: Write KPI Values

DATA.name: Metrics: Read KPI Definitions

DATA.name: Metrics: Catalog Administration

DATA.description: Allows define KPI calculation and aggregation rules needed for KPI definition.
DATA.name: Metrics: Write KPI Calculation Rules

DATA.description: Allows to assign actions to a metric value.
DATA.name: Metrics: Assign Actions to KPI values

DATA.description: Allows to read KPI calculation and aggregation rules needed for KPI definition.
DATA.name: Metrics: Read KPI Calculation Rules

DATA.description: Allows to activate KPI definitions by a change of status to "active"
DATA.name: Metrics: Activate KPIs

DATA.description: Allows to manually calculate KPI values.
DATA.name: Metrics: Manually Calculate KPI Values

DATA.description: Read and write on the aggregation queue for an asychnrous aggregation of KPI values.
DATA.name: Metrics: Asynchronous KPI Value Aggregation

DATA.name: Metrics: Process KPI Cockpit

DATA.description: Allows to automatically calculate KPI values.
